caption:
A glossy black suitcase with a rectangular shape. Features a telescoping handle and multiple wheels for mobility. Designed for travel and storage of personal items. Positioned on a wooden coffee table in a living room setting, near a sofa with cushions and a tablet.

A possibly metallic suitcase with silver coloring and a wavy texture. The tapered rim suggests it is designed for easy handling. Equipped with a retractable handle and wheels for transportation. Likely used for storing and transporting belongings. Placed on the floor next to a couch in a well-furnished room.

A fabric cushion-type object with yellow and beige colors. Soft and plush material with a square shape. Provides comfort and support. Used as a decorative element and seating accessory. Located on a sofa alongside other cushions and a tablet.

A metallic suitcase with silver coloring and a wavy texture. The tapered rim suggests it is designed for easy handling. Equipped with a retractable handle and wheels for transportation. Likely used for storing and transporting belongings. Placed on the floor next to a couch in a well-furnished room.

A glossy black suitcase with a rectangular shape. Features a telescoping handle and multiple wheels for mobility. Designed for travel and storage of personal items. Positioned on a wooden coffee table in a living room setting, near a sofa with cushions and a tablet.
